title: Language Diagnostic Leadership Education Based on Virtual Patient Simulation for Neurological Disorders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic neuroscience knowledge and foundational understanding of speech-language pathology
context.additional_context: Course for language rehabilitation service managers to improve efficient diagnostic decision-making in limited mobile environments

learning_goals: Through virtual patient simulations, learners can explain the assessment procedures for language symptoms in neurogenic communication disorders with 90% accuracy
Using simulations in mobile environments, learners can apply neurogenic language disorder diagnostic protocols within 15 minutes
Based on simulation case analysis, teams produce diagnostic reports and achieve over 85% diagnostic accuracy

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
